missions.name: Citadel: Jahleed's Fears
missions.description: Talk to the volus Jahleed at C-Sec Academy who claims his business partner is trying to kill him.

set.context: Talking to Chorban

options.context: Convince Chorban to abandon the scans (will end [megametracker://mission?id=A1.C1.ScanTheKeepers] also)

set.context: After not turning Jahleed in

missions.name: Speak with Jahleed
missions.description: Speak with Jahleed if you want to help him. He's hiding at the C-Sec Academy.

missions.name: Talk to Chorban
missions.description:
Jahleed wants you to talk to Chorban for him. The salarian will meet you in the lower markets. 

(If you have not spoken to him prior to this assignment, he will start a fight with you.)

missions.name: Talk to Jahleed
missions.description:
Jahleed wasn't telling you the whole truth. You can find him at the C-Sec Academy. 

You may want to finish [megametracker://mission?id=A1.C1.ScanTheKeepers] first (...depending on your conversation with Jahleed). If you don't turn Jahleed in or Charm/Intimidate him, you will earn a bribe.

missions.name: Citadel: Asari Consort
missions.description: The asari consort, Sha'ira, would like Shepard's help in dealing with an old client spreading lies about her. Speak with her at the [Consort's Chambers|megametracker://maplocation?id=G.C1.Presidium&title=Consort's%20Chambers&location=1468x1468] on the Presidium to begin this assignment.

set.context: Persuade Septimus to leave Sha'ira alone
Talking to Sha'ira at the end of the assignment

missions.name: Speak with Gen. Septimus
missions.description: The general is at Chora's Den in the Lower Wards. Ask him to stop spreading rumors about the Consort.
sideEffects: If Shepard brings Kaidan and Ashley along for this mission, Kaidan mocks Septimus for getting so upset over a woman, and then Ashley mocks Kaidan for not understanding women.

missions.name: Speak with Sha'ira
missions.description:
Return to Sha'ira and let her know you've spoken to [General Septimus|megametracker://person?id=O1.Septimus].

If you complete [megametracker://mission?id=A1.C1.XeltansComplaint] before returning to Sha'ira, she will give you an additional reward.

missions.name: The Consort's Gift
missions.description: Take the trinket Sha'ira gave you to the prothean ruin on Eletania.

missions.name: Citadel: Xeltan's Complaint
missions.description: [General Septimus|megametracker://person?id=O1.Septimus] would like you to talk to an elcor named [Xeltan|megametracker://person?id=O1.Xeltan] in the embassies.

missions.name: Speak to Xeltan
missions.description: Xeltan is at the elcor embassy. Find him and show him the evidence that proves Aha'ira was not to blame for his secrets getting out.

missions.name: Citadel: Rita's Sister
missions.description: [Rita|megametracker://person?id=O1.Rita], a server at Flux, is worried about her sister [Jenna|megametracker://person?id=O1.Jenna], who is working undercover for C-Sec at Chora's Den.

set.context: Persuade Chellick to stop using Jenna as an undercover agent

options.context: Reporting to Chellick, after giving Jax his money
Attempt to arrest Jax, or start a fight
options.trigger: "Sorry." and "I didn't like him." and "Shut up."

missions.name: Speak with Rita
missions.description: Rita, a waitress at Flux in the Upper Wards, is concerned about her sister, Jenna. If you want to help, speka with her.

missions.name: Talk to Jenna
missions.description: Jenna is working at Chora's Den in the Lower Wards. Speak to her and try to find out if she really is in danger.

missions.name: Return to Rita
missions.description: Jenna will not talk to you. Head back to Flux in the Upper Wards and tell Rita.

missions.name: Talk to Chellick
missions.description: [Chellick|megametracker://person?id=O1.Chellick] bumped into you at Chora's Den. He told you to meet him at the C-Sec Academy if you wanted to help Jenna.

missions.name: Make the Pickup
missions.description:
Chellick wants you to pick up a weapons shipment from the arms dealers in the Lower Wards Markets. He doesn't want you to cause any trouble. 

Note: If you kill Jax, Chellick won't reward you afterwards.

missions.name: Return the Shipment to Chellick
missions.description: Take the weapons shipment to Chellick at the C-Sec Academy.

missions.name: Citadel: Doctor Michel
missions.description:
The doctor is being blackmailed. Speak to her at the Med Clinic in the Upper Wards if you want to help.

*Note: if you have did not rescue Dr. Michel from Fist, you may have trouble getting this quest. Go back to Fist's office and then return to the Med Clinic.*

set.context: To the krogan, after confronting Morlan

missions.name: Talk to Morlan
missions.description: Find [megametracker://person?id=O1.Morlan] and put a stop to the blackmailing. He's a merchant in the Lower Wards Markets.

missions.name: Talk to Doctor Michel
missions.description: The blackmailer is dealt with. Talk to [Doctor Michel|megametracker://person?id=P1.Michel] at the Med Clinic in the Upper Wards and let her know she's safe again.

missions.name: Ask Kahoku about Banes (Optional)
missions.description: Find [Captain Anderson|megametracker://person?id=P1.Anderson] and ask him about [megametracker://person?id=O1.Banes]. Then speak to [Rear Admiral Kahoku|megametracker://person?id=O1.Kahoku] in the Citadel Tower. Note: Kahoku will not be available after [megametracker://mission?id=A1.U.MissingMarines].

missions.name: Citadel: Signal Tracking
missions.description: Scan the suspicious gambling machine in the casino at Flux to begin this assigment.

missions.name: The Source
missions.description: Abort the AI self-destruct. You can shoot the power junction or solve a puzzle. If you choose the puzzle, you will be rewarded with credits (the amount of which decreases the longer you take to solve it). On XBox: Y-X-Y-A-X-A-A. On Playstation: triangle, square, triangle, cross, square, cross, cross.

missions.name: Citadel: Presidium Prophet
missions.description: Resolve the argument between the hanar evangelist and a C-Sec officer on the Presidium.

set.context: Make the hanar leave
Make the C-Sec officer leave

missions.name: Speak with the Hanar
missions.description: Speak with the hanar preacher in the Presidium. Convince it to purchase an evangelical permit or find someplace else to preach.

missions.name: Resolve the Dispute
missions.description: You've spoken with both the hanar and the C-Sec officer in the Presidium, but you still need to either get rid of the hanar or convince the C-Sec officer to back off.

missions.name: Inform the C-Sec Officer
missions.description: Tell the C-Sec officer in the Presidium how you resolved the matter with the hanar preacher.

missions.name: Citadel: Reporter's Request
missions.description:
[megametracker://person?id=O1.Wong] in the Upper Wards is gathering information on organized crime and corruption on the Citadel. You can find the information she needs during mission [megametracker://mission?id=M1.ExposeSaren.2]. 

This assignment can be started either by talking to Wong or by examining the OSD in [Fist's|megametracker://person?id=E1.Fist] office.

set.context: Persuade Wong to give Shepard more money

missions.name: Look for Information
missions.description: As you investigate the Citadel, be on the lookout for information that might help Ms. Wong.

missions.name: Deliver Information
missions.description: The information you found in Fist's hideout will help Ms. Wong with her report on corruption. Go to the Upper Wards to deliver it to her.

missions.name: Citadel: The Fan
missions.description: Shepard's biggest fan is on the Citadel and wants an autograph. What harm could there be in talking with him?

set.context: Convince Conrad

options.trigger: "It's not that easy." / "There are other fights." / "Let's talk about trust."
"That's a load of crap." / "There are no good fights." / "Here's a test." (Shepard pulls a gun on Conrad)

missions.name: First Encounter
missions.description: [Conrad|megametracker://person?id=P1.Conrad] wants an autograph.

missions.name: Second Encounter
missions.description:
[Conrad|megametracker://person?id=P1.Conrad] wants a photograph.

*Note: This is available after leaving the Citadel for the first time (and is relying on a signal of Therum/Feros/Noveria to indicate that).*

missions.name: Third Encounter
missions.description: [Conrad|megametracker://person?id=P1.Conrad] wants to become a Spectre. Dissuade him or he will get killed starting a fight with some turians.

missions.name: Citadel: Homecoming
missions.description: [megametracker://person?id=O1.Bhatia] at the Embassy reception desk lost his wife Nerali to the geth attack on Eden Prime, but the Alliance won't release her remains.

set.context: Persuade Bosker to release the body
Persuade Samesh to leave the body with the Alliance

missions.name: Talk with Diplomat
missions.description: Speak to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Bosker], the diplomat handling [Mr. Bhatia's|megametracker://person?id=O1.Bhatia] situation and find out why his wife's body has not been returned. He is in the Embassy Lounge on the Presidium.

missions.name: Inform Mr. Bhatia
missions.description: Meet [Bhatia|megametracker://person?id=O1.Bhatia] outside the Presidium Embassies and tell him what was decided about his wife's remains.

missions.name: Citadel: Schells the Gambler
missions.description: A salarian named [Schells|megametracker://person?id=O1.Schells] is tossed out of Flux for cheating at Quasar. So he asks Shepard to test his gambling device for him. Gathering the required data requires winning 5 games, but winning 7 games will cause casino owner [megametracker://person?id=O1.Doran] to confiscate the device and any winnings. You also have the option of just giving the device to Doran for a reward.
sideEffects: Return to Flux after finishing this assignment and approach Doran on the dance floor and press A to show him Shepard's moves.

missions.name: Speak to Schells
missions.description: Schells is outside Flux in the Upper Wards. Speak to him if you want to help.

missions.name: Scan the Machines
missions.description: Schells gave you his scanning device. Go to Flux in the Upper Wards and use the gambling machines at least five times. Don't get caught.

missions.name: Speak to Schells
missions.description: Go find Schells outside Flux in the Upper Wards.

missions.name: Citadel: Snap Inspection
missions.description: On returning to the Citadel, [Rear Admiral Mikhailovich|megametracker://person?id=O1.Mikhailovich] demands an inspection of the Normandy.

missions.name: Citadel: Family Matter
missions.description: [megametracker://person?id=O1.PetrovskyM] is arguing with his dead brother's wife [Rebekah|megametracker://person?id=O1.PetrovskyR] about treating her unborn child with gene therapy.

set.context: Persuade Michael to allow Rebekah to skip the gene therapy
Persuade Rebekah to agree with Michael and try the gene therapy

missions.name: Citadel: I Remember Me
missions.description:
[Lieutenant Girard|megametracker://person?id=O1.Girard] requests Shepard's help to deal with a fellow colonist, [Talitha|megametracker://person?id=O1.Talitha], who is threatening to kill herself in the docking bay. 

Using the elevator in C-Sec Academy will start this assignment.

set.context: Dealing with Talitha

missions.name: Report to Girard
missions.description: Go see [Lieutenant Girard|megametracker://person?id=O1.Girard] in the Citadel docking bay.

missions.name: The Needle
missions.description:
[Lieutenant Girard|megametracker://person?id=O1.Girard] gave you a sedative. If you can use it on [Talitha|megametracker://person?id=O1.Talitha], she will be taken to a psychiatric facility for help. He noted that she gets more agitated the closer you get to her, but you can always walk away if she gets too upset.

_(Note: do not take more than three steps toward Talitha or she will commit suicide.)_

missions.name: Report to Girard
missions.description: Return to [Lieutenant Girard|megametracker://person?id=O1.Girard] and tell him what happened.

missions.name: Citadel: Old, Unhappy, Far-Off Things
missions.description: Speak to Zabaleta in the Wards Access section. He claims to know your parents. Requires 4 Charm or 5 Intimidate to see all dialogue options.

set.context: On first meeting Zabaleta
Persuade Zabaleta to get help
Final conversation with Zabaleta

missions.name: Call Home
missions.description: Return to the Normandy's Comm Room to contact Shepard's mother.

missions.name: Return to Zabaleta
missions.description: Return to the Wards Access section where Zabaleta is waiting. Convince him to seek help from the Veteran's Affairs Office.

missions.name: Citadel: Old Friends
missions.description: Talk to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Finch] in the Lower Wards, a fellow member of the 10th Street Reds, a gang back on Earth.

set.context: Persuade the guard to release Weisman
Persuade the guard to release Weisman
After failing to secure Weisman's release, convince Finch not to talk
Bribe or kill Finch to keep him silent

missions.name: Find The Turian
missions.description: Go talk to the turian guard at Chora's Den in the Lower Wards.

missions.name: Citadel: Planting a Bug
missions.description:
[megametracker://person?id=O1.Wong] in the Citadel Tower is gathering information on dangerously overworked traffic control operators. She wants Shepard to plant a bug in the control room so she can monitor them.

*Note: This is available after leaving the Citadel for the first time (and is relying on a signal of Therum/Feros/Noveria to indicate that).*

set.context: Persuade Wong to drop the story

events.id: Helped Emily Wong and Therum, Feros, or Noveria

missions.name: Speak to Emily
missions.description: Go to the Citadel Tower and speak to Emily Wong.

missions.name: Plant the Bug (Optional)
missions.description:
Go to Citadel Security and plant a bug in the Citadel Traffic Control Center near the back of C-Sec. 

Note: You can just tell Ms. Wong that you did what she asked, without actually planting the bug.

missions.name: Inform Emily
missions.description: Return to the Citadel Tower and inform Emily Wong that you have planted the listening device.

missions.name: Citadel: The Fourth Estate
missions.description: [Khalisa al-Jilani|megametracker://person?id=O1.AlJilani] with Westerlund News ambushes Shepard in C-Sec Academy for a hostile interview. Shepard will be rewarded for conducting the interview civilly for as long as possible, revealing nothing about [Saren|megametracker://person?id=E1.Saren].

options.trigger: "The turians helped build it." and "The crew is still Alliance."
"A great human innovation." and "I command the Normandy."

missions.name: Speak to Al-Jilani
missions.description: To please Hackett, talk to her as long as possible and don't discuss Saren. Alternatively, you can punch her smug little face in all three games.

missions.name: The Fallout
missions.description: [Hackett|megametracker://person?id=P1.Hackett] will want to talk about how the interview went the next time Shepard boards the Normandy.

missions.name: Citadel: Negotiator's Request
missions.description: The alliance diplomat [megametracker://person?id=O1.Keeler] needs a mental stimulant to gain advantage in an upcoming meeting.

set.context: Persuade Keeler to get help

conversationRewards.context: Trick Keeler into taking a depressant instead of a stimulant

missions.name: Get the Drug
missions.description:
(Optional) Go to the Med Clinic in the Upper Wards and purchase the drug that [Keeler|megametracker://person?id=O1.Keeler] needs for his treaty negotiation.

_Note: you don't have to buy him a *stimulant*..._

missions.name: Citadel: Our Own Worst Enemy
missions.description: [Charles Saracino|megametracker://person?id=O1.Saracino], leader of anti-alien Terra Firma Party, wants Shepard's endorsement in the upcoming election.

set.context: Decide whether or not to support Saracino's candidacy

missions.name: Feros: Geth in the Tunnels
missions.description: Talk to [megametracker://person?id=O1.FaiDan] again and he will explain some of the troubles facing the Zhu's Hope colonists, including that there are geth in the tunnels under the colony, likely guarding a transmitter used to coordinate attacks against the colony.

events.id: Drove The Geth Dropship From Zhu's Hope

missions.name: Find the Geth Transmitter
missions.description: Hunt in the tunnels beneath Zhu's Hope for the remaining geth forces and their transmitter.

missions.name: Inform Fai Dan
missions.description: Tell Fai Dan that you have destroyed the geth transmitter.

missions.name: Feros: Power Cells
missions.description: [megametracker://person?id=O1.OConnell] in Zhu's Hope is trying to restore power to the colony and needs Shepard to locate some power cells for her.

events.id: Drove The Geth Dropship From Zhu's Hope

missions.name: Speak to May O'Connell
missions.description: Speak to [megametracker://person?id=O1.OConnell] about the power shortages in Zhu's Hope.

missions.name: Power Cells
missions.description: Search the tunnels beneath Zhu's Hope to find the missing power cells.

missions.name: Deliver Cells to May O'Connell
missions.description: Now that you have the power cells, bring them to May O'Connell.

missions.name: Feros: Varren Meat
missions.description: [megametracker://person?id=O1.Reynolds] in the freighter on Zhu's Hope is dealing with a food shortage. He needs Shepard to kill the alpha varren in the tunnels so they can safely hunt the other varren for food.

events.id: Drove The Geth Dropship From Zhu's Hope

missions.name: Speak to Davin Reynolds
missions.description: Speak to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Reynolds] about the food shortage in Zhu's Hope.

missions.name: Find Alpha Varren
missions.description: Find and kill the alpha varren in the tunnels beneath Zhu's Hope.

missions.name: Inform Davin Reynolds
missions.description: Now that the alpha varren has been killed, inform Davin Reynolds that it is safe to hunt the varren.

missions.name: Feros: Water Restoration
missions.description: [megametracker://person?id=O1.Doyle] is trying to restore water to Zhu's Hope. The valves in the tunnels below the colony were shut off and need to be opened again.

events.id: Drove The Geth Dropship From Zhu's Hope

missions.name: Speak to Macha Doyle
missions.description: Speak to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Doyle] about the water shortage in Zhu's Hope.

missions.name: Inform Macha Doyle
missions.description: You have restored water to the colony. Inform Macha Doyle so she can get to work.

missions.name: Feros: Data Recovery
missions.description: Talk to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Hossle] among the weigh station refugees on the prothean skyway. He left behind a data disc at his console in the ExoGeni facility and needs Shepard's help to get it back.

events.id: Drove The Geth Dropship From Zhu's Hope

missions.name: Speak to Gavin Hossle
missions.description: Talk to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Hossle] at the refugee camp about the data he left behind during the evacuation of the ExoGeni facility.

missions.name: Find the Console
missions.description: Hossle's console is located in the ExoGeni base. Find it and download the data onto the OSD that he gave you.

missions.name: Deliver OSD to Hossle
missions.description: Return to Gavin Hossle at the refugee camp and give him the OSD that contains his data.

missions.name: Noveria: Espionage
missions.description:
[megametracker://person?id=O1.Calis] in the Port Hanshan Hotel thinks Rafael Vargas, the Binary Helix salesman on the other side of the lobby, is infringing on copyrights of her company, Armali. She asks Shepard to pose as a potential client and distract him long enough for her to hack his network and get the evidence she needs.

Maximum renegade points are obtained by exposing Calis to Vargas, and then lying to her that you did what she asked.

options.context: After accepting intially, refuse the assignment

set.context: Talking to Vargas
Reporting to Mallene Calis

missions.name: Keep Him Talking
missions.description:
Vargas is at the hotel bar. In order for Mallen's device to work, you have to keep him talking about business. He is a shrewd man who can tell if someone is wasting his time. 

_(Requires 12 Charm/11 Intimidate for all dialogue options.)_

missions.name: Report to Mallene
missions.description: You can be honest with Mallene about your conversation with Vargas, or lie and say it worked when it didn't.

missions.name: Noveria: Smuggling
missions.description: The hanar [megametracker://person?id=O1.Opold] wants Shepard to use his Spectre status to sneak a package through security.

set.context: Persuard Opold to tell you whom the package is for
Decide what to do with the smuggled package
Return the package to Opold
Bargain for a better deal
Keep the upgrade (Inamorda will ambush Shepard later)
Sell the package directly to Inamorda
Bargain for a better deal

options.context: Turn over the smuggled goods to Anoleis for a garage pass

missions.name: Retrieve the Package
missions.description: You've agreed to help Opold. His package has been left outside the Normandy, in the docking bay.

missions.name: Return the Package (Optional)
missions.description:
You've recovered Opold's package. It appears to be a powerful, experimental weapons mod. 

You have several options: return the package to [Opold|megametracker://person?id=O1.Opold] for credits, return it to [Inamorda|megametracker://person?id=O1.Inamorda] for more credits, return the package to [Anoleis|megametracker://person?id=O1.Anoleis] for a garage pass, or keep the package (and fight Inamorda later in the docking bay).

missions.name: Noveria: Lorik Qui'in
missions.description: [megametracker://person?id=O1.Quiin] offers a garage pass in return for recovering his evidence against Adminstrator Anoleis, in his office at Synthetic Insights. [Gianna Parasini|megametracker://person?id=O1.Gianna] will mention Lorik after you have finished speaking with Anoleis in his office, or you can just talk to Qui'in directly to acquire the mission.
sideEffects: *Infinite Paragon/Renegade Exploit*: It is possible to persuade Qui'in to testify, repeatedly, for an infinite number of Paragon/Renegade points. You just need 5 Charm/Intimidate to exploit this.

set.context: Talking to the ERCS guards in Synthetic Insights
Confronting Sergeant Stirling after killing the ERCS guards at Synthetic Insights
Decide what to do with the evidence
Return the evidence to Qui'in
Return the evidence to Gianna Parasini

After speaking with Parasini, convince Qui'in to testify against Anoleis. (*Infinite Paragon/Renegade Exploit*: You can conclude the conversation and then speak to Qui'in again, selecting the same choices, and be rewarded the morality points again.)
After convincing Qui'in to testify, blackmail Anoleis for the garage pass, but keep the evidence

options.context: Give the evidence to Gianna Parasini
Expose Gianna Parasini (this results in both of them dead)

set.context: If Anoleis was arrested, return to the Docking Bay and speak to Captain Matsuo

missions.name: Speak to Lorik Qui'in
missions.description: TODO: fix location && again below

missions.name: Select Reward
missions.description: You have several options: return the evidence to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Quiin] for credits and a garage passs, talk Qui'in into testifying and return the evidence to [Gianna Parasini|megametracker://person?id=O1.Gianna] for a garage pass, or return the evidence to Anoleis for a garage pass. There are also variants on these choices (like letting Anoleis and Parasini kill each other and taking the garage pass from Anoleis' body).

missions.name: Noveria: Quarantine
missions.description: [Dr. Cohen|megametracker://person?id=O1.Cohen] and his team were exposed to a toxin. If you get them a cure, he will give you access to the maintenance tunnels to the Secure Lab.

missions.name: Talk to Ventralis
missions.description: You'll need to ask Ventralis for permission to enter the quarantine labs.

missions.name: Make a Cure
missions.description:
Head to the quarantine lab, which is downstairs near the science team quarters. There should be equipment and notes that will allow you to replicate the scientists' work and create a cure. 

_(Note: [megametracker://person?id=O1.Iallis], a servant of [Matriarch Benezia|megametracker://person?id=E1.Benezia], will ambush you after creating the cure.)_

missions.name: _Alestia's Attack_
missions.description:
_(This objective is listed in the game under [megametracker://mission?id=M1.Noveria.10RiftStation])_

You were attacked by geth in the quarantine lab. [megametracker://person?id=O1.HanOlar] told you they came from the sealed maintenance area. [Dr. Cohen|megametracker://person?id=O1.Cohen] might be able to get you inside.

missions.name: Return to Cohen
missions.description: You've got the cure. Return it to [Dr. Cohen|megametracker://person?id=O1.Cohen] in the infirmary.

missions.name: _The Back Door_
missions.description:
_(This objective is listed in the game under [megametracker://mission?id=M1.Noveria.10RiftStation])_

You persuaded [Dr. Cohen|megametracker://person?id=O1.Cohen] to give you his pass. You can now sneak into the sealed maintenance area near the science team quarters and the quarantine lab.

missions.name: Virmire: Assisting Kirrahe's Team
missions.description: [Kirrahe|megametracker://person?id=P1.Kirrahe] is leading a team against the base on Virmire. He asks Shepard to distract the geth so his team can make it through. His life depends on Shepard completing this mission.

set.context: When disabling the alarms to the base

missions.name: Disrupt Communications
missions.description: Find and destroy the terminal on the communications tower.

missions.name: Destroy the Satellite Uplink
missions.description: Find and destroy the uplink on the satellite tower.

missions.name: Destroy Geth Flyers
missions.description: Find the refueling platform and destroy all the geth flyers there.

missions.name: Disable Alarms
missions.description: Find the terminal to unlock the entrance to the base. Shepard has the option to trigger the alarms there or on the far side of the base. The latter choice will put extra pressure on [Kirrahe's|megametracker://person?id=P1.Kirrahe] team (possible resulting in Kirrahe's death).

missions.name: Virmire: Wrex and the Genophage
missions.description: [Wrex|megametracker://person?id=S1.Wrex] has discovered that [Saren|megametracker://person?id=E1.Saren] has a cure for the Genophage and that [Kirrahe|megametracker://person?id=P1.Kirrahe] intends to destroy it. Shepard must deal with him before the mission. 8 Charm or 8 Intimidate or the successful completion of [megametracker://mission?id=A1.L.WrexFamilyArmor] are required to keep Wrex from being killed during this conversation. (Additionally, Wrex will survive if Shepard hasn't recruited [Garrus|megametracker://person?id=S1.Garrus] or Liara, but few players opt for that scenario.)

set.context: Calm Wrex down

options.trigger: "I wouldn't do this otherwise." and "We are."

set.context: Kill Wrex

options.context: Earlier, Shepard asks Ashley to be ready, and then Shepard signals Ashley to shoot him

set.context: Shepard takes too long talking to Wrex, and Ashley kills him to protect Shepard

options.trigger: Complete Virmire having acquired only 4 squadmates (ie, Shepard has not yet met Garrus or Liara).

missions.name: Talk to Wrex
missions.description: Speak with Wrex and calm him down.

missions.name: UNC: Asari Diplomacy
missions.description:
After receiving a message from [Nassana Dantius|megametracker://person?id=O1.Dantius] while aboard the Normandy, return to the Citadel and speak to Nassana in [the Embassy Lounge|megametracker://maplocation?id=G.C1.Presidium&title=Nassana%20Dantius&location=1115x687]. She wants Shepard to rescue her kidnapped sister. (You may also start this assignment by hacking into Yaroslev Tartakovsky's logs at the Peak 15 research facility on Noveria.) 

You will be rewarded with special Armali Council product access after completing this assignment.
missions.x-comment-x: ----------------- TODO!! Yaroslev Tartakovsky's logs on Noveria  ------------------

missions.name: Meet with Nassana
missions.description: Speak to Nassana in the Embassy lounge on the Presidium level of the Citadel.

missions.name: Find Dahlia
missions.description: Go to the Macedon System in the Artemis Tau cluster and infiltrate the mercenary base.

missions.name: Inform Nassana
missions.description: Go to the Embassy Lounge on the Presidium level of the Citadel and tell Nassana Dantius that her sister Dahlia is dead.

missions.name: UNC: Besieged Base
missions.description: At 80% Paragon, [Hackett|megametracker://person?id=P1.Hackett] will inform you of a biotic group that have taken the civilians at a research post in [megametracker://maplocation?id=G.Ear.Had.Cac.Cho.1Science&type=Map] hostage.

set.context: Refusing the assignment while talking to Hackett
During the assault

options.trigger: Between one and four civilian casualties.

missions.name: Get to Medical Base
missions.description: get to the medical base on Chohe, located in the Cacus System of the hAdes Gamma cluster, and eliminate the biotics while avoiding civilian casualties.

missions.name: Report to Hackett
missions.description: Return to the Normandy and use the galaxy map to report in to Admiral Hackett.

missions.name: UNC: Cerberus
missions.description: Upon returning to [Kahoku|megametracker://person?id=O1.Kahoku] after finishing [megametracker://mission?id=A1.U.MissingMarines], he tells you about Cerberus, the group responsible, and asks you to eliminate their research outposts in the [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Voyager].

missions.name: UNC: Dead Scientists
missions.description: A terminal in the Port Hanshen hotel on Noveria reveals a doctor in the [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Kep.Newton] who is in danger. You can also acquire this mission by going to [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Kep.New.Ontarom].

missions.name: Find the Doctor
missions.description: Head to the Newton System in the Kepler Verge and find the one remaining scientist assigned to the secret project.

missions.name: Report to Hackett
missions.description: With the situation resolved, you should now make your report to Admiral Hackett.

missions.name: UNC: Depot Sigma-23
missions.description:
Head to the unidentified space facility in [megametracker://maplocation?id=G.Ear.Argos&type=Map] to find the source of the engineered rachni infestation and destroy it.

Memorize your route through the facility, as you will have to exit in a (timed) hurry.

events.id: Completed Listening Post Alpha and Theta

missions.name: Go to the Gorgon System
missions.description: Go to the Gorgon System in the Argos Rho cluster and locate Depot Sigma-23.

missions.name: Set Off Demo Charge
missions.description:
An organization called Cerberus is responsible for the rachni infestations. In order to prevent further problems, activate the station's scuttle system and evacuate to the Normandy. 

You will have 70 seconds to evacuate.

missions.name: UNC: Derelict Freighter
missions.description: You encounter the MSV Cornucopia drifting in [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Mar.Caspian]. It ventured into the Perseus Veil and returned with the crew tranformed into electrified husks.

missions.name: UNC: Geth Incursions
missions.description: Reports suggest the geth are setting up outposts in the [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Armstrong].  These reports can be found on a terminal in teh ExoGeni facility on Feros, or on Virmire ([TODO]). (You can also acquire the assignment by traveling to the [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Armstrong].)

set.context: After Hackett gives Shepard the assignment

missions.name: UNC: ExoGeni Facility
missions.description: Hacking a terminal on the upper level of the ExoGeni headquarters on Feros reveals some suspicious ExoGeni activity in [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Mar.Vostok].

set.context: Refusing Dr. Ross's bribe

events.id: Drove The Geth Dropship From Zhu's Hope

missions.name: Investigate Facility
missions.description: Nodacrux is located in the Vostok system of the Maroon Sea Cluster. Head there and find out what's going on.

missions.name: Explore Colony
missions.description: Investigate the ExoGeni facility.

missions.name: UNC: Hades' Dogs
missions.description: Having found [Kahoku's|megametracker://person?id=O1.Kahoku] body in [megametracker://mission?id=A1.U.Cerberus], you are now pursuing those responsible to [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Voy.Col.Nepheron].

set.context: Responding to the Shadow Broker's offer to buy the Cerberus data files found on Nepheron

missions.name: Destroy Main Cerberus Facility
missions.description: You've found teh location of a major Cerberus facility. Head to Nepheron in the Columbia System of the Voyager Cluster and destroy it.

missions.name: The Shadow Broker
missions.description: When you return to the Normandy, an agent of the [the Shadow Broker|megametracker://person?id=E2.ShadowBroker] offers to buy the Cerberus files obtained on Nepheron.

missions.name: UNC: Hostage
missions.description:
The head of the Alliance Parliamentary Subcommittee on Transhuman Studies, [Chairman Burns|megametracker://person?id=Burns], was kidnapped by biotic extremists. They are holding him aboard the MSV Ontario. 

You will only have 3 minutes to reach the hostage after the biotics realize you are onboard. You can just make a run for it, as fighting will stop once you reach the room with the leader inside.

You can obtain this mission from the elevator announcements on the Citadel, or by just going to [megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Had.Farinata].

set.context: Talking to the L2 biotic leader

options.context: (Selecting this option results in a fight and eliminates any further dialog choices)

missions.name: Board Freighter
missions.description: Find the freighter in Farinata System of the Hades Gamma cluster and make your way to the biotics on board.

missions.name: Negotiate with the Leader
missions.description: Convince the biotics to release Chairman Burns (or kill them, whatevs).

missions.name: UNC: Colony of the Dead
missions.description: A server node in the ExoGeni Facility on Feros reveals doctor's notes regarding some troubling samples he received from a mysterious group called Cerberus. (You may also start this assignment by just heading out and finding the research station which supplied the samples.)

missions.name: Go to System
missions.description: The logs mention something about the Matano system, in the Maroon Sea cluster. That would be a good place to start your investigation.

missions.name: Search for Clues
missions.description: Fight your way through the hostile transformed colonists while searching for survivors and clues.

missions.name: UNC: Espionage Probe
missions.description:
Hacking a terminal aboard the downed Borealis on Feros will reveal an Alliance secret: they put a nuclear payload inside an old espionage probe. They need you to recover the probe before this is discovered. 

You may also start this assignment by just heading out and finding the probe.

missions.name: Find the Probe
missions.description: The probe's signal is coming from the Amazon System in the Voyager cluster. Head there and track it down.

missions.name: Escape
missions.description: Escape from the trap that Haliat has left for you. If possible, take down Haliat, as well.

missions.name: UNC: Listening Post Alpha
missions.description:
A group of Alliance soldiers are pinned down by rachni on [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Sty.Ere.Nepmos]. 

This assignment is acquired by travelling to [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Sty.Erebus].

missions.name: Go to the Erebus System
missions.description: Head to the Erebus System in the Styx Theta cluster. Investigate Listening Post Alpha on the planet Nepmos.

missions.name: Destroy Rachni Base
missions.description: Go to the coordinates marked on your map and destroy teh underground racnhi base.

missions.name: UNC: Listening Post Theta
missions.description:
An Alliance listening post on [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Sty.Ach.Altahe] has gone silent.

You can obtain this assignment by either heading to [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Sty.Ach.Altahe], or by completing [megametracker://mission?id=A1.U.ListeningPostAlpha] first.

missions.name: UNC: Lost Module
missions.description: [Hackett|megametracker://person?id=P1.Hackett] needs you to recover a data module from a [downed probe|megametracker://maplocation?id=G.Ear.Att.Her.Ele.2&type=Map] before the geth can get to it. A [space monkey|megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Att.Her.Ele.Mine&title=Space%20Monkey&location=1636x994] has taken it.
sideEffects: *Infinite Paragon Glitch*: If you don't kill any space monkeys and save right after recovering the data module, you can reload the game and recover the data again, for an unlimited number of times.

options.trigger: Locate the data without killing any space monkeys. (*Infinite Paragon Glitch*: If you save right after this choice, you can reload the game and recover the data again repeatedly, for an unlimited number of times (no additional saves/reloads necessary).)

missions.name: Go to Hercules System
missions.description: Travel to the Hercules System in the Attican Beta Cluster and find the drone containing the data module.

missions.name: Track the data module
missions.description: An alien creature has run off with the data module. Track down the alien and recover the data module.

missions.name: UNC: Lost Freighter
missions.description: The MSV Worthington is adrift in [megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Gem.Ming] and seems to be abandoned. Be careful navigating through the hold, as it has been booby-trapped. Listen to the logs to discover what happened and then deal with [megametracker://person?id=O1.Julia] and her boyfriend [megametracker://person?id=O1.Jacob], the man on life support.

missions.name: UNC: Missing Survey Team
missions.description:
A survey team has gone missing in [megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Hades].

You can obtain this mission from the elevator announcements on the Citadel, or by just landing on [megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Had.Ant.Trebin].

missions.name: Find Missing Researchers
missions.description: Travel to the Antaeus System in the Hades Gamma Cluster to look for the missing survey team.

missions.name: Explore Excavation Site
missions.description: Log entries indicate the research team discovered something in the nearby excavation site. Go there and find out what happened.

missions.name: UNC: Missing Marines
missions.description:
If you have completed the assignment [megametracker://mission?id=A1.C1.DoctorMichel], [Anderson|megametracker://person?id=P1.Anderson] will refer you to [Rear Admiral Kahoku|megametracker://person?id=O1.Kahoku] in the [Citadel Tower|megametracker://maplocation?id=G.C1.Tower&title=Kahoku&location=1231x1435], to ask about [megametracker://person?id=O1.Banes]. He reveals that one of his teams found the man's body on a derelict ship. Kahoku sent a unit to the scout the area, and they have gone missing.

You can also just locate the team on Edolus, or speak to Kahoku independently, and he will ask you to look for his missing unit. 

Note: Kahoku will leave the Citadel after you begin [megametracker://mission?id=A1.U.Cerberus], so finish this assignment first or he won't be there when you come back to the Citadel.

missions.name: Distress Call
missions.description: Land on Edolus in the Sparta System of the Artemis Tau Cluster and investigate the source of the distress call.

missions.name: Speak to Kahoku
missions.description: You've found the dead bodies of men who served under Admiral Kahoku. Return to the Citadel Tower and inform the admiral of their fate.

missions.name: UNC: Privateers
missions.description:
The MSV Majesty was attacked by pirates travelling through [megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Hor.Strenuus]. Find those responsible and inform [Garoth|megametracker://person?id=O1.Garoth] on the Citadel.

You can obtain this mission by speaking to Garoth in the Citadel Tower, from a terminal on Noveria, or by scanning the MSV Majesty itself.

options.context: Reject the assignment from Garoth (you may return to accept it later)

set.context: Tell Garoth what happened to his brother

missions.name: Speak to Garoth (Optional)
missions.description: Talk to Garoth in the Citadel Tower about his missing brother.

missions.name: Speak to Garoth (Optional)
missions.description: Talk to Garoth in the Citadel Tower about his missing brother.

missions.name: Go to the Strenuus System
missions.description: Go to the Strenuus System in the Horse Head Nebula cluster and search for signs of Garoth's brother and his ship.

missions.name: Go to Xawin
missions.description: Go to Xawin in the Strenuus System of the Horse Head Nebula and locate the privateers responsible for destroying the ship. Take the datapad from the body found upstairs.

missions.name: Inform Garoth
missions.description: You've discovered what happened to Willem, Garoth's brother. Return to the Citadel Tower and tell Garoth of his brother's fate.

missions.name: UNC: Hostile Takeover
missions.description: A computer console in the C-Sec Academy offices reveals that C-Sec is suspicious of Helena Blake, currently at [the Emporium|megametracker://maplocation?id=G.C1.Presidium&title=Helena%20Blake&location=711x1207]. You can also acquire this assigment by speaking to [megametracker://person?id=O1.Helena] directly.

set.context: Speaking to Helena Blake in the Presidium
Speaking to Helena Blake at her mercenary base on Amaranthine
Speaking to Helena Blake at her mercenary base on Amaranthine

missions.name: Find Helena Blake
missions.description:
The C-Sec report mentioned that Helena was last seen near the Emporium in the Financial District of the Presidium. 

Once you find her, you can refuse Helena's request for some paragon, and still continue with the assignment.

missions.name: Eliminate Crimelords
missions.description: The two crimelords are located in the Han System of teh Gemini Sigma cluster and in the Dis System of the Hades Gamma cluster. Eliminate both of them.

missions.name: Inform Helena Blake
missions.description: Go to the Fortuna system in the Horse Head Nebula and meet Helena Blake to claim your reward.

missions.name: UNC: Rogue VI
missions.description: On reaching level 20, [Hackett|megametracker://person?id=P1.Hackett] will inform you that the Alliance has lost control of one of their training VIs on the Moon and they need you to eliminate the VI.

set.context: Accepting the assignment from Admiral Hackett

missions.name: Engage VI
missions.description: Head to the Sol System in the Local Cluster and deal with the rogue VI on Earth's moon.

missions.name: Destroy VI Conduits
missions.description:
Destroy the conduits in each of the three VI cores. 

Each of the three facilities is identical in layout. Neutralize eight VI conduits in each bunker. Attacking the conduits in a bunker will result in a defensive reaction from the VI. The first bunker results in poisonous gas, which reduces healing. The second, energy shields cover the conduits and the doors. The third, more drones are called in.

missions.name: Specialization Class
missions.description:
On completion of the assignment, you must select a specialization class. There are six specialization classes, with only two options available to you dependent on your Shepard's main class (Soldier, Engineer, etc.).

*Bastion*: improves Barrier, reduces enemy Stasis, reduces biotic cooldown.

*Commando*: improves weapon damage, improves cooldown on Immunity, Assassinate, Marksman.

*Medic*: improves First Aid, Neural Shock; allows for squad revival with Medi-gel.

*Nemesis*: improves duration, damage and radius of many biotic abilities.

*Operative*: improves cooldowns, radius, and damage for many tech abilities.

*Shock Trooper*: improves health and damage protection, improves cooldown on Immunity, Adrenaline Burst.

missions.name: UNC: Major Kyle
missions.description: A computer console in Executor Palin's office reveals the deaths of two Alliance officials sent to investigate [Major Kyle|megametracker://person?id=O1.Kyle] at his compound in [megametracker://map?id=G.Att.Hawking].

set.context: Responding to Admiral Hackett's request to investigate the commune
Persuade the cultists to allow you to speak to Major Kyle
Speaking to Major Kyle
Persuade Major Kyle to surrender

missions.name: Investigate Major Kyle's Compound
missions.description:
Go to the Century System in the Hawking Eta cluster and investigate Major Kyle and his biotic followers. 

Enter the larger structure first, and speak with the cultists inside. If you persuade them to cooperate, you can go directly to the underground facility and speak to [Major Kyle|megametracker://person?id=O1.Kyle] without any fighting. Otherwise, you will need to clear the larger structure and activate the [control panel|megametracker://maplocation?id=G.Att.Haw.Cen.Pre.1Building&title=Control%20Panel&location=943x1769] in the back in order to open the underground facility yourself, where you will have to fight those cultists also (the diplomatic solution is unavailable).

missions.name: Talk to the Major
missions.description: Make your way through the compound to find Major Kyle and see if he can be reasoned with.

missions.name: Return to the Normandy
missions.description: Admiral Hackett needs to be informed.

missions.name: UNC: The Negotiation
missions.description:
At 80% Renegade, [Hackett|megametracker://person?id=P1.Hackett] will ask you to negotiate a treaty on Element Zero mining rights with a man named [megametracker://person?id=O1.Darius] in [the Plutus System|megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Had.Plutus].

The only way to accomplish this is to remain polite and give Darius everything he asks for. Hackett secretly does not want this - he would prefer you kill Darius.

set.context: During the negotiations with Darius

missions.name: Meet Darius
missions.description: Meet Darius at the rendezvous point on the planet Nonuel in the Plutus System of the Hades Gamma cluster.

missions.name: report to Hackett
missions.description: Return to the Normandy and use the galaxy map to report the outcome to Admiral Hackett.

missions.name: UNC: Distress Call
missions.description:
Unusual readings were found in [megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Argos]. It appears to be a distress call from the medical transport Sacred Angel.

This assignment can be obtained from the terminal in [megametracker://maplocation?id=G.C1.Presidium.Udina&type=Map] on the Citadel, or by going to [megametracker://map?id=G.Ear.Arg.Hyd.Metgos].

missions.name: Investigate Distress Call
missions.description: Find the downed med ship in the Hydra System of the Argos Rho cluster and provide assistance.
